December 26, 1922
Dear Doctor Carter:
div1.p:
This will acknowledge your letter of December 15 addressed
to Mr. Rose in reference to our remittance which we sent you by
check #40535 amounting to $145.34.

Our object in sending you this amount was to reimburse you
for all of the money which you had spent and in this way restore the
$100 advance which you have had in the past.
With kindest personal regards, I remain,
div1.closer:
Very truly, Robert H. Kirk Dr. Henry R. Carter
2121 California St., N.W.
Washington, D. C.
